0.name: Thwack
0.fullDesc: Deals Quantum DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong> of Seele's ATK to a single enemy.
0.shortDesc: Deals minor Quantum DMG to a single enemy.

0.name: Sheathed Blade
0.fullDesc: Increases Seele's SPD by {{2, percent}}% for {{3}} turn(s) and deals Quantum DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong> of Seele's ATK to a single enemy.
0.shortDesc: Deals Quantum DMG to a single enemy and increases SPD.

0.name: Butterfly Flurry
0.fullDesc: Seele enters the Amplification state and deals Quantum DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong> of her ATK to a single enemy.
0.shortDesc: Enters the <orangeStrong>Amplification state</orangeStrong> and deals massive Quantum DMG to a single enemy.

0.name: Resurgence
0.fullDesc:
Enters the Amplification state upon defeating an enemy with Basic ATK, Skill, or Ultimate, and receives an extra turn. While in the Amplification state, the DMG of Seele's attacks increases by {{1, percent}}% for {{2}} turn(s).
Enemies defeated in the extra turn provided by "Resurgence" will not trigger another "Resurgence."
0.shortDesc: When <orangeStrong>defeating enemy targets</orangeStrong> with Basic ATK, Skill, or Ultimate, gains an <orangeStrong>extra turn and enters the Amplification state</orangeStrong>. While in Amplification, increases the DMG dealt by this unit.

0.name: Phantom Illusion
0.fullDesc: After using her Technique, Seele gains Stealth for {{1}} second(s). While Stealth is active, Seele cannot be detected by enemies. And when entering battle by attacking enemies, Seele will immediately enter the Amplification state.
0.shortDesc: Enter <orangeStrong>Stealth</orangeStrong> mode. After attacking an enemy and entering battle, enters the <orangeStrong>Amplification state</orangeStrong>.

0.name: Attack
0.fullDesc: Attacks an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

0.name: Nightshade
0.fullDesc: When current HP percentage is {{1, percent}}% or lower, reduces the chance of being attacked by enemies.

0.name: Lacerate
0.fullDesc: While Seele is in the Amplification state, her Quantum RES PEN increases by {{1, percent}}%.

0.name: Rippling Waves
0.fullDesc: After using a Basic ATK, Seele's next action advances by {{1, percent}}%.

1.name: Extirpating Slash
1.desc: When dealing DMG to an enemy whose HP percentage is {{1, percent}}% or lower, CRIT Rate increases by {{2, percent}}%.

2.name: Dancing Butterfly
2.desc: The SPD Boost effect of Seele's Skill can stack up to {{1}} time(s).

3.name: Dazzling Tumult
3.desc:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

4.name: Flitting Phantasm
4.desc: Seele regenerates {{1}} Energy when she defeats an enemy.

5.name: Piercing Shards
5.desc:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

6.name: Shattering Shambles
6.desc:
After Seele uses Ultimate, inflict the attacked enemy with "Butterfly Flurry" for {{2}} turn(s). Enemies in "Butterfly Flurry" will additionally take 1 instance of Quantum Additional DMG equal to {{1, percent}}% of Seele's Ultimate DMG every time they are attacked. If the target is defeated by the "Butterfly Flurry" state's Additional DMG triggered by other allies' attacks, Seele's Talent will not be triggered.
When Seele is knocked down, the "Butterfly Flurry" inflicted on the enemies will be removed.
